venue.address_1: 55 Thayer Street, Near Harrison Ave - Boston
venue.name: Soprafina Gallery 55 Thayer Street, Near Harrison Ave - Boston

item.description:
DIRECTIONS TO THE GALLERY CAN BE FOUND HERE:

http://www.soprafina.com/directions.htm


Forget about poking Facebook friends and trading endless texts with that person from OKCupid. Time to add some offline socializing to your calendar!

Check in at 7pm and mingle. Enjoy some delicious cheeses and chocolates as well as an open Champagne, Prosecco & White Wine bar and a private gallery rental for our group. The open bar will be served until 9:30pm.

Light music will be playing, the wine will be flowing and the Gallery will have a featured Art Exhibit perfect for using as a conversation starter.

Now you can meet people face to face before setting up that first date. Remember what that was like?

ADMISSION - PLEASE READ CAREFULLY

$32 if you prepay in advance

$27 IF YOU PREPAY WITH A FRIEND

(Codes can not be applied after registration)

PREPAY HERE: http://atwysbostonartwine.eventbrite.com/

Â 

AT THE DOOR - PER PERSON

$40 per person



ADMISSION INCLUDES:

Private Gallery Rental

Staff of Three Greeters

Water & Soda

Open Prosecco, Champagne & White Wine Bar from 7-9:30pm

Cheeses & Chocolates


Dress is trendy/upscale.

Absolutely NO sneakers, active wear or jeans.

No, guys, suits are not required. But when you see how fashionable the ladies look, you'll be glad if you dressed to impress. Ladies, you can wear anything from your little black dress to what you wore to work that day. Light music will play and new friends will be made. Show up with your room mate, your life mate, your co-workers..or show up alone. There will be a staff of 3 or more volunteers on hand to help introduce you to other members.

group.name: The Boston Social/Singles Networking Meetup Group

item.name: Art, Wine & Introductions Wine Social - Ages 25-45 - 12 spots left
